home.title: Where talents become stars
home.description: Join the top talent agency and become a star on Bigo Live.
home.aboutUs: At Stellar Agency, we are the catalyst behind numerous successful events and campaigns, delivering exceptional talent that leaves a lasting mark on your brand. Whether it's dynamic models or captivating performers, our talent ensures your brand stands out and reaches new heights. We specialize in a range of services, including Content Production and Influencer Marketing, all designed to boost your brand's presence across various platforms. Our dedication, experience, and relentless pursuit of excellence drive every project we take on. Partner with us at Stellar Agency, and let's achieve greatness together!

join.title: Join Our Agency
join.description: Are you ready to take your talent to the next level? Apply to join Stellar Agency today!

bigo.para1: Bigo Live offers an ideal platform for creators in Indonesia. Whether you're looking to earn extra income from the comfort of your home or pursue a full-time career as an influencer, Bigo Live provides limitless opportunities. With the flexibility to set your own schedule, create engaging content, and be your own boss, the possibilities are endless.
bigo.para2: By live streaming on Bigo Live, you can educate, inspire, influence, showcase products or services, and grow your personal brand, all while connecting with a captivated global audience. Additionally, you’ll have the opportunity to network with other creators, top streamers, influencers, and even celebrities. With over 400 million users worldwide, Bigo Live is not just a rewarding platform but also one of the highest-paying live-streaming apps available.
bigo.para3: In your initial months, you can expect to earn around IDR 3,000,000 - IDR 15,000,000, and as your follower base grows, your monthly earnings can increase to IDR 40,000,000 - IDR 150,000,000 or even exceed IDR 200,000,000. Your earnings are directly proportional to the time and effort you put into your live streams. Consistency and a friendly personality are key to achieving success on this platform.
bigo.para4: So, if you're ready to unleash your creativity, connect with a global community, and earn a substantial income doing what you love, join Bigo Live today! The world is eager to discover your talent.
bigo.why1: At Stellar Agency, we set you up for success on Bigo Live with expert tips, a dedicated support team, and exclusive opportunities through our Bigo partnership. We don’t just help you become a top host – we guide your journey to becoming a recognized influencer and brand ambassador.
